select temp.*,(SXSZ+LJZL+GZZF+JCNL+ZZXTNL+CXNL+LDNL+ZRX+FWYS+MBDC+GLXL+XSKF) SUM from (select REALNAME,DOCNAME,checkedaccount.CHECKEDACCOUNTID ACCOUNTID, TRUNCATE(avg(case SXSZVALUE 'sxszvalue'),2) SXSZ, TRUNCATE(avg(case LJZLVALUE 'ljzlvalue'),2) LJZL, TRUNCATE(avg(case GZZFVALUE 'gzzfvalue'),2) GZZF, TRUNCATE(avg(case JCNLVALUE 'jcnlvalue'),2) JCNL, TRUNCATE(avg(case ZZXTNLVALUE 'zzxtnlvalue'),2) ZZXTNL, TRUNCATE(avg(case CXNLVALUE 'cxnlvalue'),2) CXNL, TRUNCATE(avg(case LDNLVALUE 'ldnlvalue'),2) LDNL, TRUNCATE(avg(case ZRXVALUE 'zrxvalue'),2) ZRX, TRUNCATE(avg(case FWYSVALUE 'fwysvalue'),2) FWYS, TRUNCATE(avg(case MBDCVALUE 'mbdcvalue'),2) MBDC, TRUNCATE(avg(case GLXLVALUE 'glxlvalue'),2) GLXL, TRUNCATE(avg(case XSKFVALUE 'xskfvalue'),2) XSKF from checkedaccount join account on checkedaccount.CHECKEDACCOUNTID=account.ACCOUNTID join checkdoc on checkedaccount.docid=checkdoc.docid and checkedaccount.docid = #{docid}
GROUP BY CHECKEDACCOUNTID) temp order by ACCOUNTID
